Interface Connectable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConductionArea, DrillItem, Pin, PolylineTrace, Trace, Via

    public interface Connectable
    Functionality required for items, which can be electrical connected to other items.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains_net(int p_net_no)
      Returns true if this item belongs to the net with number p_net_no.
      java.util.Set<Item> get_all_contacts()
      Returns a list of all connectable items overlapping and sharing a net with this item.
      java.util.Set<Item> get_all_contacts(int p_layer)
      Returns a list of all connectable items overlapping with this item on the input layer and sharing a net with this item.
      java.util.Set<Item> get_connected_set(int p_net_no)
      Returns all connectable items of the net with number p_net_no, which can be reached recursively from this item via normal contacts.
      java.util.Set<Item> get_normal_contacts()
      Returns the list of all contacts of a connectable item located at defined connection points.
      TileShape get_trace_connection_shape(ShapeSearchTree p_tree, int p_index)
      Returns for each convex shape of a connectable item the subshape of points, where traces can be connected to that item.
      boolean shares_net_no(int[] p_net_no_arr)
      Returns true if the net number array of this and p_net_no_arr have a common number.

    • Method Detail

      • contains_net

        boolean contains_net(int p_net_no)
        Returns true if this item belongs to the net with number p_net_no.
        Parameters:
        p_net_no - a int.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • shares_net_no

        boolean shares_net_no(int[] p_net_no_arr)
        Returns true if the net number array of this and p_net_no_arr have a common number.
        Parameters:
        p_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • get_all_contacts

        java.util.Set<Item> get_all_contacts()
        Returns a list of all connectable items overlapping and sharing a net with this item.
        Returns:
        a Set object.

      • get_all_contacts

        java.util.Set<Item> get_all_contacts(int p_layer)
        Returns a list of all connectable items overlapping with this item on the input layer and sharing a net with this item.
        Parameters:
        p_layer - a int.
        Returns:
        a Set object.

      • get_normal_contacts

        java.util.Set<Item> get_normal_contacts()
        Returns the list of all contacts of a connectable item located at defined connection points. Connection points of traces are there endpoints, connection points of drill_items there center points, and connection points of conduction areas are points on there border.
        Returns:
        a Set object.

      • get_connected_set

        java.util.Set<Item> get_connected_set(int p_net_no)
        Returns all connectable items of the net with number p_net_no, which can be reached recursively from this item via normal contacts. if p_net_no <= 0, the net number is ignored.
        Parameters:
        p_net_no - a int.
        Returns:
        a Set object.

      • get_trace_connection_shape

        TileShape get_trace_connection_shape(ShapeSearchTree p_tree,
                                     int p_index)
        Returns for each convex shape of a connectable item the subshape of points, where traces can be connected to that item.
        Parameters:
        p_tree - a ShapeSearchTree object.
        p_index - a int.
        Returns:
        a TileShape object.
